Peter John Henry Elliott (14 June 1930 - Disemba 2016) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-agba egwu, onye a na-eme ihe ngosi na onye na-egosi na 5elivishọn.

Elliott anọwo na-egwu mmiri kemgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ na ọdọ mmiri Marshall Street mgbe Sid Dalton, onye nkuzi Olympic bịakwutere ya. Ọ zụrụ nke ọma ma nọchite anya Britain na egwuregwu Olympic nke 1948 na 1952, na London, England. Elliott mechara bụrụ onye na-agụ egwu pop ma bụrụ onye na-agụ egwu ballad na ATV's Oh Boy!. O dere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-aga nke ọma, abụọ n'ime ha enwetala ihe nrite na Cannes Film Festivals.
